channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Our New Book, Mobile System Design Interview, Is Now Available】我们的新书《移动系统设计采访》现已可用
item.description: 【Our new book, Mobile System Design Interview, is available on Amazon!】我们的新书《移动系统设计采访》可在亚马逊上获得！

item.title: 【EP167: Top 20 AI Concepts You Should Know】EP167：您应该知道的前20个AI概念
item.description: 【Which other AI concept will you add to the list?】您还将添加哪个AI概念？

item.title: 【Shopify Tech Stack】Shopify Tech堆栈
item.description: 【Note: This article is written in collaboration with the Shopify engineering team.】注意：本文是与Shopify工程团队合作编写的。

item.title: 【Database Schema Design Simplified: Normalization vs Denormalization】数据库架构设计简化：归一化与非正式化
item.description: 【The goal isn't to declare one approach as the winner. It's to understand their mechanics, consequences, and ideal use cases.】目标不是将一种方法宣布为赢家。这是了解他们的机制，后果和理想用例。

item.title: 【EP168: AI Vs Machine Learning Vs Deep Learning Vs Generative AI】EP168：AI与机器学习与深度学习与生成AI
item.description: 【What else will you add to understand these concepts better?】您还会添加什么以更好地理解这些概念？

item.title: 【A Guide to Database Transactions: From ACID to Concurrency Control】数据库交易指南：从酸到并发控制
item.description: 【In this article, we break down the key building blocks that make transactional systems reliable in the face of concurrency.】在本文中，我们分解了使交易系统在并发时可靠的关键构件。

item.title: 【How Lyft Uses ML to Make 100 Million Predictions A Day】Lyft如何使用ML每天做出1亿个预测
item.description: 【In this article, we’ll look at how Lyft built an architecture to accomplish this requirement and the challenges they faced.】在本文中，我们将研究Lyft如何构建建筑以完成这一要求及其面临的挑战。

item.title: 【EP166: What is Event Sourcing? 】EP166：什么是事件采购？
item.description: 【The event sourcing paradigm is used to design a system with determinism. This changes the philosophy of normal system designs.】事件采购范式用于设计具有决定论的系统。这改变了正常系统设计的理念。

item.title: 【How the Google Cloud Outage Crashed the Internet】Google云中断如何崩溃了互联网
item.description: 【On June 12, 2025, a significant portion of the internet experienced a sudden outage. What started as intermittent failures on Gmail and Spotify soon escalated into a global infrastructure meltdown. For millions of users and hundreds of companies, critical apps simply stopped working.】2025年6月12日，很大一部分互联网突然发生了停电。最初是因为Gmail的间歇性失败和Spotify很快升级为全球基础设施崩溃。对于数百万用户和数百家公司而言，关键应用程序只是停止工作。

item.title: 【Object Oriented Design Interview Book is here — now available on Amazon!】面向对象的设计采访书在这里 - 现在在亚马逊上可用！
item.description: 【*BIG* announcement: Our new book, Object Oriented Design Interview, is available on Amazon!】* Big*公告：我们的新书，面向对象的设计采访，可在亚马逊上获得！
